document_data.caption: A map of Leuthilspar with Throleatha's Public House marked at #26.
document_data.name: Throleatha's Public House
document_data.mainbody: '''Throleatha's Public House''' was a restaurant in [[Leuthilspar]] on the island of [[Evermeet]]. Its proprietor was [[Throleatha]], an [[gold elf|gold elven]] [[sorceress]].
document_data.Atmosphere: It was a quiet and reserved place. Most of its clientele were gold elves. Nobles often met here to discuss their affairs as the establishment offered a number of private rooms and booths. [[Silver elves]] and [[green elves]] were accepted but visited infrequently, often finding it too quiet.
